definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job

sentences.english: Development hairbrush is reverse and revolving , is developed more fully , image is more distinct.
sentences.chinese: 顯影兩支毛刷雙向旋轉，顯影更充分，圖像更清新。

sentences.english: Can use the brush and vacuum cleaners, washing the dust on the coil.
sentences.chinese: 可使用毛刷和吸塵器清洗盤管上的灰塵。

sentences.english: Forming by motorized hoisting mould, use brush to fold and smoothen paper edge then output automatically.
sentences.chinese: 模具電動升降，經四邊毛刷衝整，掃平紙面自動出料。

sentences.english: This machine has brush roller and water powder-removing dual function.
sentences.chinese: 本機具有毛刷輥和水除粉兩道功能。

sentences.english: Adopts 2pairs of brushes, 2 pairs of water dip rolls, fully guarantees the glass washing effect.
sentences.chinese: 採用2對毛刷，2對蘸水輥，充份保證玻璃清洗效果。

sentences.english: Cleaning and brush speed can be independent speed CVT.
sentences.chinese: 清洗速度和毛刷速度均能獨立無級變速。

sentences.english: Hair brushes from the past but very much part of the future.
sentences.chinese: 毛刷從過去但未來非常重要的一部分。

sentences.english: A children watches big wooden hairbrushes on the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 一個小朋友在展覽上觀看木製的大毛刷。

sentences.english: Quality bristles that will not damage capsules.
sentences.chinese: 優質毛刷，不會對膠囊造成損傷。

sentences.english: Immersion, double brush developing, the plate is meticulous.
sentences.chinese: 浸泡式處理方式，雙毛刷顯影，衝版更均勻細緻。

sentences.english: EX:I sill wanted my eyelashes to be thicker.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然要把我的睫毛刷得濃密一點。

sentences.english: Remove collected ice or snow on the landing gear with a rag or a soft brush.
sentences.chinese: 用抹布或軟毛刷去除起落架上的冰或雪。

sentences.english: Brush your cat often to remove falling hair, so it won't lick the hair off and swallow it.
sentences.chinese: 經常把貓身上脫落的毛刷掉，以免它舔喫自己的毛。

sentences.english: Now that you have all your brush settings adjusted, go ahead and brush on some flakes.
sentences.chinese: 現在，您都設置毛刷的調整，繼續和刷子的一些石片。

sentences.english: I want my eyelashes to be thicker.
sentences.chinese: 我想要把我的睫毛刷得濃密點。

sentences.english: No heat, brushing with the Rolling Brush, or brush can be direct.
sentences.chinese: 無需加溫，用滾刷或毛刷直接塗刷即可。
